text: Question 31 Let G = (V, E) be a weighted undirected graph and let T be a Minimum Spanning Tree (MST) of G maintained using adjacency lists. Suppose a new weighed edge (u,v) € V x V is added to G. The worst case time complexity of determining if T is still an MST of the resultant graph is D oz © =) © oi50ev) ® v Algorithm Minimum Spanning Tree
